tit.cmt: 京福のサイトより、このようにいたしました。(参考：http://randen.keifuku.co.jp/map/01.html）

sen.j: 四条大宮駅（しじょうおおみやえき）は、京都府京都市下京区四条大宮町にある京福電気鉄道京福電気鉄道嵐山本線の鉄道駅。
sen.e: Located in Shijo-omiya-cho, Shimogyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, Shijo-Omiya Station is a stop on the Arashiyama Main Line, which is operated by Keifuku Electric Railroad Co., Ltd..
Shijo-Omiya Station, located in Shijo-omiya-cho, Shimogyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a stop on the Arashiyama Main Line, which is operated by Keifuku Electric Railroad Co., Ltd.
Shijo-omiya Station, located in Shijo-omiya-cho, Shimogyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a stop on the Arashiyama Main Line, which is operated by Keifuku Electric Railroad Co., Ltd.
sen.cmt: 京福のサイトより、このようにいたしました。(参考：http://randen.keifuku.co.jp/map/01.html）

sen.j: 駅ナンバリングはA1。
sen.e: The station number is A1.
The station number is A1.
The station number is A1.

sen.j: 阪急電鉄大宮駅 (京都府)は、四条大宮交差点の地下に駅舎が設置されている。
sen.e: The station house of Omiya Station (located in Kyoto Prefecture) of Hankyu Corporation is placed under the Shijo-Omiya crossing.
The station house of Omiya Station (located in Kyoto Prefecture) of Hankyu Corporation is situated under the Shijo-Omiya crossing.
The station house of Omiya Station (Kyoto Prefecture) of Hankyu Railway is situated under the Shijo-Omiya crossing.

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 四条大宮交差点南西角に存する地平駅。
sen.e: The station is located on the gound level at the southwest corner of the Shijo-Omiya crossing.
The station is located on the gound level at the southwest corner of the Shijo-Omiya crossing.
The station is located on the ground level at the southwest corner of the Shijo-Omiya crossing.
sen.cmt: スペルを修正しました。

sen.j: プラットホームは3面2線の櫛形。
sen.e: Comb-type platforms serving two tracks are provided.
Comb-type platforms serving two tracks are provided.
Three comb-type platforms serving two tracks are provided.

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 1910年（明治43年）3月25日 嵐山電車軌道の駅として開業。
sen.e: March 25, 1910: This station started its operation as a station of Arashiyama Trams.
March 25, 1910: This station started operating as a facility of Arashiyama Trams.
March 25, 1910: This station started operating as a facility of Arashiyama Electric Tramway.
sen.cmt: 嵐山電車軌道→Arashiyama Electric Tramway としました。

sen.j: 1918年（大正7年）4月2日 会社合併により京都電燈の駅となる。
sen.e: April 2, 1918: The companies concerned merged and it became a station of the Kyoto Dento electric power company.
April 2, 1918: The companies concerned merged, and it became a station of the Kyoto Dento electric power company.
April 2, 1918: The companies concerned merged, and it became a station of Kyoto Dento, an electric power company.
sen.cmt: 京都電燈→Kyoto Dento, an electric power company としました。

sen.j: 1942年（昭和17年）3月2日 路線継承により京福電気鉄道の駅となる。
sen.e: March 2, 1942: The tramway was transferred to Keifuku Electric Railroad Co., Ltd., and this station became a station of the company.
March 2, 1942: The tramway was transferred to Keifuku Electric Railroad Co., Ltd., and this station became a facility of that company.
March 2, 1942: The tramway was transferred to Keifuku Electric Railroad Co., Ltd., and this station became a facility of that company.

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

sen.j: 四条大宮駅 A1 - 西院駅 A3
sen.e: Shijo-Omiya Station (A1) - Sai Station (A3)
Shijo-Omiya Station (A1) - Sai Station (A3)
Shijo-omiya Station (A1) - Sai Station (A3)
sen.cmt: 京福のサイトより、このようにいたしました。(参考：http://randen.keifuku.co.jp/map/01.html）

sen.j: なお以前は、当駅と西院駅の間に壬生駅 (京都府)が存在したが、利用客が少なく1971年（昭和46年）7月11日に廃止された。
sen.e: In the past, Mibu Station existed between this station and Sai Station, but its operation was discontinued on July 11, 1971, due to a shortage of its users.
In the past, Mibu Station existed between this station and Sai Station, but its operation was discontinued on July 11, 1971, because few people used it.
In the past, Mibu Station existed between this station and Sai Station, but its operation was discontinued on July 11, 1971, because few people used it.

sen.j: 当駅と西院駅の間の営業キロは1.4kmあり、京福電気鉄道で最も長い駅間となっている。
sen.e: The distance between this station and Sai Station along the railroad is 1.4 km, making it the longest of those between adjacent stations on the line of Keifuku Electric Railroad.
The distance between this station and Sai Station along the railroad is 1.4 km, making it the longest of those between adjacent stations on the line of Keifuku Electric Railroad.
The distance between this station and Sai Station along the railroad is 1.4 km, making it the longest of those between adjacent stations on the line of Keifuku Electric Railroad.

sen.j: 平成19年3月に正式に使用開始となった駅ナンバリングはA2が欠番となっており、当駅と西院駅の間（前述の旧・壬生駅付近）に新駅設置計画があることがうかがえるが、現在は特に具体化しているわけではない。
sen.e: In the system of giving a number to each station, which started in March of 2007, A2 has not been assigned to any station, and it is considered that a plan to build a new station between this station and Sai station (around the site where the former Mibu Station once existed) may exist, but no specific plan has been made yet.

In the system of giving a number is given to each station, which started in March 2007, A2 has not been assigned to any station, and it is considered that a plan to build a new station between this station and Sai Station (around the site where the former Mibu Station once existed) may exist, but no specific plan has been devised.

In the system of giving a number to each station, which started in March 2007, A2 has not been assigned to any station, and it is considered that a plan to build a new station between this station and Sai Station (around the site where the former Mibu Station once existed) may exist, but no specific plan has been devised.
sen.cmt: 一部文法を修正しました。
